metadata.description:
When our hero gets the chance to ditch work and play in a senior league game of Broadside with their older brother Carlos and his best friend Riz, they know this is their shot. They join the game using a guest alias: WARHEAD.
What happens during the game gives our hero an idea. Carlos and Riz do their best to ignore this harebrained scheme... until it works.

Read your Broadsider\'s version of Episode One here: https://deadmall.broadside.wtf/episodes/1
Must hold a Broadsider to mint a copy of Broadside: Episode One - NFT First Edition

Episode 1 - n00b - NFT First Edition
December 2022

Written by Charlie Stratford-Rex

Art by Vector Meldrew
